title: 918Secretary Sean Duffy: @CAGovernor & his state were caught red-handed after weeks of claiming they
content:
1369 Secretary Sean Duffy: @CAGovernor & his state were caught red-handed after weeks of claiming they did nothing wrong. Now that we’ve exposed their lies, 17,000 illegally issued trucking licenses are being revoked.California must revoke every illegally issued CDL or I will pull $160M in federal funds. posted 8 hours ago by Mr_Rightside 85 comments award share download report block
85 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Elon Just Walked Away – And His Reason Changes Everything Read More Ads by Ad.Style Krat 95 points 7 hours ago Did you get a liberal judges permission to pull that funding ?!? permalink award report block reply Grindelwald 29 points 7 hours ago Waiting for that. It seems that all these liberal judges are outing themselves and positioning to be impeached from office. permalink parent award report block reply MasterChief08 35 points 7 hours ago They'll never be impeached. We need other solutions permalink parent award report block reply glow-operator-2-0 5 points 5 hours ago laughs in #4 buckshot permalink parent award report block reply Rudy_DankMemer 1 points 1 hour ago We need other solutions They used soy to erode men's resolve.... now, all we do is meme & shitpost, then bitch about how nothing ever changes. #Groundhog day. permalink parent award report block reply Krat 16 points 7 hours ago Still holding out for those arrests too ? permalink parent award report block reply UCantStumpTheTrump 2 points 4 hours ago I see you posting the same bullshit dooming comments on every thread. James Comey, Letitia James and John Bolton have been indicted with more coming down the pipeline permalink parent award report block reply Doritalos 5 points 7 hours ago In two more weeks.... permalink parent award report block reply Seldom_Seen_Kid 5 points 7 hours ago Impeachment means fuck all to these people. They have been issuing regular licenses to MILLIONS of illegal invaders and registering them to vote. They don't actually vote themselves, the democrats do that for them. permalink award report block reply Get_Off_Big_Tech 31 points 7 hours ago This. They register you to vote at the DMV when you get a license. permalink parent award report block reply Reefay 15 points 7 hours ago Motor Voter permalink parent award report block reply SavingPrivateGrace 10 points 7 hours ago We couldn't out cheat them if we tried. Hence, they had to issue a new REAL ID product. The state is so massively corrupt. permalink parent award report block reply IncredibleMrE1 4 points 7 hours ago Absolutely correct. permalink parent award report block reply CrankyCrab 3 points 7 hours ago California is the mecca for fuckery! permalink parent award report block reply HunterBidensPC 40 points 7 hours ago I love how lying has no consequences anymore permalink award report block reply snoopy3210 9 points 7 hours ago Yeah but the 17000 number is probably a lie too, that’s way too fast. It is wholly inadequate to the government of any other" - John Adams permalink parent award report block reply UsernameChexOut 2 points 7 hours ago I mean, technically it does, just not the ones that we want. The consequences are all positive for the liars. permalink parent award report block reply Iremembermypassword 1 points 7 hours ago Sorry, but a district judge has ruled that lying is ok. permalink parent award report block reply highlandparker 1 points 4 hours ago if it helps brown gay or woman permalink parent award report block reply POTUS_DonnieJ 26 points 7 hours ago Can we please stop tweeting threats in response to gross violations of federal law that put all of us in danger and JUST DO IT?? permalink award report block reply SutopSutolf 1 points 4 hours ago They’re already doing shit that they don’t tweet. Watch how quickly they fold. permalink parent award report block reply Mr_Rightside OP 12 points 8 hours ago https://x.com/SecDuffy/status/1988626102722474277 permalink award report block reply josiborg 12 points 7 hours ago STFU and pull it anyway. permalink award report block reply maverick202 10 points 7 hours ago You know nothing is going to happen when they send out strongly worded tweet. permalink parent award report block reply josiborg 4 points 6 hours ago I know it's all a continued choreographed show to the masses there's an actual America First platform while we get the Syrian president getting slobber jobbers in the oval office, 600,000 more Chinese university students, H1B visa trendline at an exponential curve, rehiring all with back pay worthless government employees to steal more taxes, bullshit deportation rates that put my children in higher danger of rape & honor killings, free healthcare to Ukraine & Israel, .. it's all a fucking a show man and we're just the same useful puppets to pillage. permalink parent award report block reply KernalMustard 4 points 6 hours ago I had faith. Its now on us. Prepare yourselves for the shitstorm permalink parent award report block reply Meddlesom 11 points 6 hours ago He's doing things in the wrong order. Oh no! How will California survive? ARREST SOMEONE. ANYONE! Using petty nicknames in this tweet, saw previous tweets where he used all caps in classic Trump style. It’s so transparent it’s hilarious. “Trump’s style must have worked because he’s President, so let’s just copy it.” Lollll permalink award report block reply Oleander 4 points 2 hours ago Goes to show that these really are empty suits that stand for nothing. Do the families that lost loved ones to those "licensed" truckers get to sue California? I'm absolutely certain if I myself issued 17,000 illegal licenses I would be going to jail forever. permalink award report block reply Klaus73 2 points 5 hours ago Sounds like a breakdown between States. permalink award report block reply itspancakees 2 points 5 hours ago Just pull the funding now, why wait?! permalink award report block reply SaltyTitties4 2 points 2 hours ago HOW ABOUT YOU ARREST EVERY PERSON WHO ISSUED THOSE ILLEGAL LICENSES??? if that isn’t done, this is just a stupid fake show as usual to make us think something good is happening. California will not revoke its CDLs in a timely manner. permalink award report block reply ActNow 2 points 7 hours ago 17K!?! I thought the roads were getting crazy. Thank you, Secretary Duffy. permalink award report block reply schiff_for_brains 2 points 7 hours ago The damage has already been done.  There are official plastic cards saying No Name Given is qualified to drive massive trucks on the road. permalink award report block reply Snooptwo 2 points 2 hours ago How about pull the funds first and give them back when they comply. permalink award report block reply scrubking 2 points 6 hours ago Another day, another empty Republican threat. permalink award report block reply Truth_Cipher 1 points 6 hours ago Just pull all funding and let things sort themselves out.
